name: Heroes Chronicles: Clash of the Dragons and Masters of the Elements
name_original: Heroes Chronicles: Clash of the Dragons and Masters of the Elements
description:
Heroes Chronicles: Clash of the Dragons and Masters of the Elements is a strategy game developed by New World Computing. It was originally released in 2000. The 3DO Company published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Heroes Chronicles: Clash of the Dragons and Masters of the Elements is available on PC.
